A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far and away the worst Star Wars movie ever made\, perhaps one of the worst sci-if space epics ever put to the screen.  Rian Johnson has\, single-handed\, destroyed the essence of Star Wars.  Disney\, rest assured\, I will never ever hand over the price of admission for any project involving Rian Johnson. If you want to see a sequel that honors the original source material and provides continuity but pushes toward new and refreshing storytelling then go see Blade Runner. \n\nI will not see IX\, no point.  All the interesting characters were killed off\, the antagonist is a troubled teenager that throws temper tantrums and the protagonist is a Mary Sue.  There is nothing more interesting to see here move along move along.
